rooms.description: Open corridor leading from the north-facing entrance into a minimalist foyer.
Open-plan living area seamlessly integrated with the kitchen. Minimalist design with large windows for ample natural light.
Open-plan kitchen adjoining living area. Features modern minimalist fixtures and state-of-the-art appliances.
Dedicated quarters for servants designed with privacy in mind while maintaining minimalist aesthetics.
Primary bathroom integrated near the living area. Minimalist fixtures and ample space for comfort.

openings.description: North-facing entrance door allowing natural light and a welcoming entry.
Large windows ensuring cross ventilation and adherence to Vastu principles by aligning with the north-east.

design_principles.description: Focus on simplicity, clean lines and functional space usage.
North-facing entrance for prosperity, optimal room placements in line with Vastu norms.
